import React from"react";import desam from"../img/desam.png";//import Navbar from "./Navbar";

var toTop=function toTop(){scroll.scrollToTop({delay:0,duration:0});};//assigning location variable
var location=useLocation();//destructuring path name from location
var pathname=location.pathname;//Javascript split method to get the name of the path in array
var splitLocation=pathname.split("/");//sticky header
useEffect(function(){var selectHeader=document.querySelector("#header");if(selectHeader){document.addEventListener("scroll",function(){window.scrollY>80?selectHeader.classList.add("sticked"):selectHeader.classList.remove("sticked");});}},[]);// mobile view menu
var mobilemenu=function mobilemenu(event){event.preventDefault();var mobileNavShow=document.querySelector(".mobile-nav-show");var mobileNavHide=document.querySelector(".mobile-nav-hide");mobileNavShow.classList.toggle("d-none");mobileNavHide.classList.toggle("d-none");document.querySelector("body").classList.toggle("mobile-nav-active");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{id:"header",className:"header fixed-top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid container-xl d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"logo ",onClick:toTop,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:desam,alt:"Symbiotic Info tech Pvt. Ltd",title:"Symbiotic Info tech Pvt. Ltd",style:{maxWidth:"150px",maxHeight:"50px"}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{onClick:mobilemenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"mobile-nav-toggle mobile-nav-show bi bi-list"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"mobile-nav-toggle mobile-nav-hide d-none bi bi-x"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{id:"navbar",className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{onClick:mobilemenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:splitLocation[1]===""?"active":"",children:" Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",className:splitLocation[1]==="about"?"active":"",children:" About Us"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/services",className:splitLocation[1]==="services"?"active":"",children:" Services"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/careers",className:splitLocation[1]==="careers"?"active":"",children:" Careers"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:splitLocation[1]==="contact"?"active":"",children:" Contact Us"})})]})})]})})});};export default InnerHeader;
